messages.subject: Gardening/outsourcing questions_have you done this?
messages.msgSnippet: I have a garden space that I want to either rent out or do a you can  use this and instead of money share some of the produce. I want someone  who will use
messages.messageBody:
I have a garden space that I want to either rent out or do a you can use this and instead of money share some of the produce. I want someone who will use organic and not chemicals on the stuff. And who wouldn't mind unschoolers asking questions and learning. I am not up to renting a plow and planting myself.

Have you ever done it? If yes what was good about it or bad about it? How did you work out times for them to come ? How did you set boundaries?
and anything else you can think of that I haven't yet..


---------------------------------
